guests.name: Nardevi Poon
guests.title: Minsister at Social Development Ministry, Gandaki Predesh

guests.name: Sudip Aryal
guests.title: Regional Electoral Officer -Coordinator at UNDP
guests.desc: With more than 10 years’ of experience in Information and communication technologies for development (ICT4D) with Government and private sector nationally and internationally, about 5 years of techno-functional experience with UNDP in supporting Election Commission of Nepal for conducting Constituent Assembly Election 2013 in the areas of Information Communication technologies(ICTs ) and technical assistance in all the major activities of Electoral Cycle and my master’s thesis in “Electoral System and Electoral technologies” , I have deep interest to contribute to United Nations' Program to assist countries to conduct free, fair and credible Election.

guests.name: Niranjan Udas
guests.title: Project Coordinator at Genese Software solutions
guests.desc: I am a tech enthusiast and an aspiring entrepreneur. I love to learn and am pretty good at it. I also believe that there are people who are better than me and am always looking for such people from whom I can learn more.
